description:
runtime: move Itab to runtime.h

The 'type' field of Itab will be used by the garbage collector.

messages.text:
LGTM

Thanks for updating the description.

Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Why?

Please include information about reasons for changes in the CL
descriptions so that we can find them when we're looking back at
changes.

Thanks.
Russ

> Why?
> 
> Please include information about reasons for changes in the CL
> descriptions so that we can find them when we're looking back at
> changes.

> Russ
